name: ciao bella
notes:
hello, beautiful; good-bye, beautiful!

to celebrate a new chapter in the yarn twisters journey we created this jaunty little scarf pattern as a gift to our wonderful customers we have meet and served over the last 7 years!

yarn: 1 skein yarn twisters finn; 420 yards/115g; 100% 17 micron count sw merino, or any fingering weight yarn

sample knit with colourway laike; approx 50g used

gauge: 24 sts by 24 rows equal 4” by 4” in lace pattern after blocking

needles: 4 mm (us 6) needle; or size needed to obtain gauge

notions: darning needle, stitch markers optional to mark the pattern repeats

finished size: centre depth: 5.5” (14cm); wingspan: 52.5” (133cm)

to make this scarf shorter/longer, you can eliminate/add repeats in the middle section

errata march 25, 2025: 
increase section, row 103: added a yo to the repeat section
middle section, row 7: added a yo to the repeat section

errate april 7, 2025:
increase section:
row 3: added a k1 after the kfb
row 25: k4, sl3 wyif
row 43: added a yo to the repeat section
row 79: removed the k1 after the first kfb
row 93: repeat x 5
row 95: changed to k1 after the first kfb and removed the k1 before the second kfb
row 101: repeat x 5
decrease section:
removed row 70
